title: SPACIOUS ROOMS-TO-RENT / 4br/2ba APARTMENT
posting_body: Contact Justin only by email at: contact (at) <URL>
12-month lease at $1,125 per room / per month.
Located in 4BR / 2 BA / 1,448 sqft apartment in Somerville neighborhood.
Living room, Dining room, Kitchen and Bathroom are considered Shared Areas.
Move-in requires: 1st, Security Deposit, Broker Fee / Available 9/1/22 /
No Short-Term lease
Recently upgraded unit with hardwood flooring throughout, central heat, oversized in-unit washer dyer, and fully updated kitchen and bathrooms.
Gracious bedrooms, all accommodating at least queen beds with ample closet space.
Tranquil, rear facing, private deck overlooking the common backyard.
Stainless steel appliance package with gas cooking, full-sized dishwasher, and ample granite countertop space, perfect for the home chef.
Space for a sizable dining room table, multiple desks and or additional storage off the kitchen.
Private basement storage included.
Building is professionally managed with easy maintenance requests and electronic payment.
3 minutes away from the Sullivan Square T Station.
Short commute to Assembly Row, Encore Casino, the heart of Cambridge and downtown Boston.
Great highway and public transport commutability.
• Hardwood Floors
• Oversized in-unit washer & dryer
• Stainless steel appliance package with gas cooking
• Full-sized Dishwasher
• Private basement storage included
• Rent includes Water, Sewerage disposal, Snow removal, Grounds maintenance
• Building is professionally managed
• Pets considered on a case-by-case basis
Video walk-through tour available upon request
Contact Justin only by email at: contact (at) <URL>
Pricing, brokerage coverage, and availability subject to change without notice based on availability, lease term, and move-in date selected.
Pictures may be of similar unit.
Finishes may be different than pictured in this ad.
The apartment advertised may no longer be available for rent.
